# rafay_project (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_project" "tfdemoproject1" {
  metadata {
    name        = "tfdemoproject1"
    description = "tfdemoproject1 description"
    labels = {
      env  = "dev"
      name = "app"
    }
  }
  spec {
    default = false
  }
}
```
